OperatorMsg.description: Text message to be displayed to the **operator**

ResultCode.description:
Validation result code:
- when **less than 100** means redemption **ACCEPTED**
- when **greater than 100** mean redemption **DENIED**
[70] Validate Result
1: Approved
2: Free entry
3: Free exit
4: Reentry
6: Operator Override
7: Approved *
10: Crossover
11: Already exit
13: Group entry
14: Group reentry
15: External approved
71: Already exit
72: Approved*
99: Reserved for internal use
100: Good Ticket Limit
101: Internal exception
102: Media not found
103: Inactive media
104: Media not printed
106: Inactive product
107: Ticket not encoded
108: Entry closed
109: Exit closed
110: Invalid APT ID
111: Ticket not validated
112: Offline disabled
113: Future offline date time
114: Offline date time before last usage
115: Media not found
116: Invalid attribute filter
117: Invalid attribute on ticket
118: Certificates cannot be redeemed
119: Product suspended
120: Product part of a package invalid for entry
121: Blocked product
301: Wrong day
302: Ticket expired
303: Wrong time
304: Expired (EoW)
305: Expired (EoM)
306: Expired (EoY)
307: Expired (1M)
308: Expired (1Y)
309: Too early
310: Too late
311: No more entries
312: Reentries not allowed
313: No more reentries
314: First entry only
315: Not used for exit
316: Recently used
317: Invalid performance
318: Override not allowed
319: No more overrides
320: No More Items
321: Invalid Product
322: Wallet insufficient credit
323: Invalid event exit
324: Need biometric enrollment
325: Need biometric check
326: Biometric check failed
327: Primary ticket required
328: Reentries only
329: Invalid passthrough
330: First entry and crossover only
331: First entry and reentry only
332: Reentries and crossover only
333: Crossover only
334: Insufficient reward points
335: Biometric not enrolled
336: No more group entries
337: Invalid crossover
338: Daily re-activation denied
339: Offline invalid site
340: Offline accept days
341: Biometric check disabled
342: Need ID verification
343: ID verification failed
344: Need manual verification
345: Manual verification failed
346: Biometric source misplaced
347: Previous scan not yet finalized
348: Invalid crossover time
349: External redemption failed
350: No organization payment available
351: Account missing
501: No entitlements
502: No performances
503: Inactive performance
504: Invalid event
505: External system error
506: Anonymous ticket not allowed
507: Account disabled
508: Consignment account disabled
509: Consignment insufficient credit
510: Missing day booking

513: Second usage wait

550: APT generic error
600: No linked tickets

UsedOverrideTypes.description:
List of **override types** actually used in order to validate the redemption
**Override type** that can be used are:
- Sent in the request (RedemptionPoint.OverrideTypes)
- Dynamically taken from ticket's exceptions (ie "Ignore crossover time restrictions"

ValidateDataList.description: Optional. List of parameters returned by an external redeem plugin"

ChargedAmount.description:
Evaluated only by the Validate service. Positive values are points added to the portfolio. Negative values are points removed from the portfolio.
Up to 4 decimals allowed

ValidityType.description:
LkSNMemPointValidityType
[341] Validity Type
1: Valid for discount
2: Valid for payment

Status.description:
LkSNPortfolioSlotBalanceStatus
[365] Portfolio Slot Balance Status
1: Active
2: Expired

bearerAuth.description: The token must be signed with HMAC-SHA256 algorithm using the secret key configured in Horizon. The JWT payload must include the 'cid' claim with the value of the client id as configured on Horizon.

info.description: The api for handling the turnstyles integrated with Gantner's
info.title: Accesso Horizon / Gantner Access Control APIs
